generated_text:
"Module 11: Python" (81 minutes, Intermediate)
In this lab, practice Python programming by completing hands-on exercises. Review data types, functions, and control structures. Apply Python to real-world scenarios, such as data analysis and file manipulation. Work through guided activities to reinforce concepts and build skills.

mcqs.question: What is the primary focus of Module 11?
What is one of the real-world scenarios where Python can be applied?

flashcards.back: Basic elements of a programming language used to declare variables
Elements of a programming language used to control the flow of a program
